duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, training development, and post-project work and data analysis.
Utilize science expertise in item development, scoring process, client meetings, and educator interactions.
Engage in clear communication via various channels, in-person and virtual interactions with customers and educators.
Mentor and train Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in role expectations and performance.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Life Science or Physical Sciences (Math courses preferred)
